virtual.adelina:
Hello, I‚Äôm Adelina. Let's have a pleasure talk! I can do many things like:
- Draft an email or other piece of writing
- Write Python code
- Answer questions about a set of documents
- Support conversations
- Tutor in a range of subjects
- Translate languages
- Compose a poem
- Simulate characters for video games and much more
virtual.exchange_bot: Hi! I'm your exchange bot ‚Çø. I operate instantly and anonymously. Send **/help** to see what I can do. **‚Ñπ**Ô∏è Learn more on the ADAMANT blog.
virtual.bounty_bot: Welcome! Earn ADM with your social activity! Send **/help** command for details.
virtual.donate_bot: ADAMANT Messenger thrives thanks to your support. Donate ADM, Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other tokens directly in this chat. For more wallets, visit: https://adamant.im/donate. Thank you!
virtual.welcome_message:
**ADAMANT** is a **truly independent** blockchain messenger‚Äîfree from governments, corporations, or even its own developers. Powered by a **decentralized network**, **open-source code**, and **user feedback**, it ensures autonomy. Every action, like messaging or saving contacts, incurs a **0.001 ADM fee** to sustain the network.

Unlike centralized or typical P2P messengers,
# ADAMANT Provides:
üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è **True Anonymity**: No phone numbers, no emails. Your IP is hidden even from partners. For extra privacy, connect via the **Tor app**.
üõ°Ô∏è **Censorship-Resistance & Unstoppable**: No one can block, restrict, or deactivate accounts. Users have full control‚Äîand full responsibility‚Äîfor their content.
üõ∞Ô∏è **Decentralized file sharing**: Powered by IPFS, files stay distributed and uncensorable
üîê **Security by Design**: Seamlessly access your account across multiple devices while preserving full end-to-end encryption
üåê **Community-Driven**: No venture capital, no corporations‚Äîjust cypherpunks and code
üëõ **Crypto wallet and In-chat crypto transfers**: Send and receive crypto with full control of your private keys
‚öíÔ∏è **Forging ADM**: Run your own delegate or vote for a forging pool to support the network and earn ADM
# Take it Seriously:
Your privacy is **in your hands**. Stay safe: avoid unknown links, set a device password, and only share your ADM address directly. More tips: https://adamant.im/staysecured.

**Your Passphrase = Your Responsibility**. Write it down physically‚Äîit **cannot be recovered**. If lost or stolen, your tokens and chats are gone forever. Treat it like a **billion-dollar wallet**.
# Get Started Now:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Claim free welcome ADM
2Ô∏è‚É£ Share your ADM address with friends
3Ô∏è‚É£ Follow us on GitHub and X
4Ô∏è‚É£ Trade ADM
5Ô∏è‚É£ Contribute

warning_on_addresses.headline: Your account may be compromised
warning_on_addresses.about: You can accept crypto transfers directly in chat, thanks to ADAMANT storing wallet addresses on the blockchain. Saving an address requires your passphrase‚Äîso no one else can add incorrect addresses on your behalf.
warning_on_addresses.specifics_wrong_addresses: The app detected an inconsistency in your stored {crypto} address. Currently saved as: {storedAddress}, but the correct address is: {correctAddress}. This means if someone sends you {crypto} in-chat, you won‚Äôt receive it.
warning_on_addresses.specifics_many_addresses: The app detected multiple {crypto} addresses stored in your account: {manyAddresses}. This suggests that fraudulent addresses may have been added.
warning_on_addresses.full_list_wrong_addresses: Full list of cryptocurrencies with mismatched addresses: {crypto_list}.
warning_on_addresses.reasons: Your account may be compromised. It‚Äôs possible that you entered your passphrase into a phishing app that looked authentic, or that hackers have gained access to it.
warning_on_addresses.what_to_do: We recommend transferring all your crypto from this account to a new one. Ensure your device is secure and use only trusted sources to access the app. Remember: you are solely responsible for the security of your account.
warning_on_addresses.forget_button: Don't show again on this device
